lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the core of young players on the Los Angeles Dodgers who are being counted on during the 50-game suspension of their veteran teammate Manny Ramirez misidentified the playoff series in which the Dodgers swept the Chicago Cubs last fall. It was a National League Division Series — not the N.L. Championship Series, which Los Angeles lost to Philadelphia.
